lines.text: radial-gradient(circle, transparent 20%, var(--B) 20%, var(--B) 80%, transparent 80%, transparent),
radial-gradient(circle, transparent 20%, var(--B) 20%, var(--B) 80%, transparent 80%, transparent) 50px 50px,
.editor, .grid li, .stream { font-family: "Roboto",Helvetica,Arial,"Hiragino Sans","Font Awesome 5 Free","Font Awesome 5 Brands","AppIcons",sans-serif }
